name: UKRoads
0:
”Alexa, ask UK Roads what's the status of the M25.”
”Alexa, open UK Roads and give me any incidents on the A1.”
”Alexa, ask UK Roads how is the traffic on the M6.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: u. k. roads
des: UK Roads provides the status of UK motorways, listing any incidents, accidents, closures, maintenance work etc. Areas covered: England, Scotland, Wales. The information comes from the Highways Agency, Traffic Scotland and Traffic Wales.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
